dct_title_s: Peru = Pérou = Perú = Peru / Reise Know-How.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours, gradient tints, and spot heights. Depths shown by isolines and bathymetric tints. Ellipsoid: WGS84. Map shows railroads, six classes of roads, railroads, paths, road distance, pipelines. "Rip & waterproof"--Panel. Includes indexes to place names and protected areas, coverage map, color illustrations, and publisher's advertisement. Location map indicating sheet coverage, coverage map, and publisher's list on cover. Map is continued on verso.
